page.title: 04LIVING IN BURNESTON
page.content: I live in Burneston, my house is just outside Burneston and the name of the house is called Albert House, and it is about 200 years old. It is a farm house and we have some, well quite a lot of animals really. When I go to school, at break we play on the buck, we put the adjustible legs on the top knotch, but we can't even get on it, so we put it down to four holes showing and we can jump it. When I go home I get changed and I go riding. I some times go to youth club on Friday, and we go swimming every month in Northallerton.I like living in Burneston.
